doc.title: (Im) Properly Dressed
doc.plot: Cassandra is in such a rush to get to work in the morning that she forgets to put on her dress. Not that the men in her office complain about her strutting about in nothing but her well-filled lingerie. Nikki, on the other hand prefers to work around the house in nothing but her bra and panties. She works in her garden wearing the same costume, much to the delight of her male neighbors.
